sys_script.name: SaaS Customer Import Trigger

sys_update_version.name: sys_script_7639347683e322107f442a4279da1e3f
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>true</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>false</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>x_snc_apex_gp_saas_import_trigger</collection><condition/><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition/><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>SaaS Customer Import Trigger</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) {
    try {
        gs.info('[Business Rule] Starting SaaS Customer import...');
        
        // Call your script include
        var importer = new x_snc_apex_gp.SaaSCustomerImport();
        importer.importCustomers();
        
        // Update the trigger record with success status
        current.setValue('import_status', 'Import completed successfully at ' + new GlideDateTime());
        current.update();
        
        gs.info('[Business Rule] SaaS Customer import completed successfully');
        
    } catch (e) {
        gs.error('[Business Rule] SaaS Customer import failed: ' + e.message);
        
        // Update the trigger record with error status
        current.setValue('import_status', 'Import failed: ' + e.message);
        current.update();
    }
})(current, previous);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2025-08-27 13:44:09</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>7639347683e322107f442a4279da1e3f</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>SaaS Customer Import Trigger</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Apex GP" source="x_snc_apex_gp">3d6f8a89832322107f442a4279da1ef2</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Apex GP">3d6f8a89832322107f442a4279da1ef2</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_7639347683e322107f442a4279da1e3f</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2025-08-27 13:45:36</sys_updated_on><template/><when>async_always</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=7639347683e322107f442a4279da1e3f"/></record_update>
